definitions.definition: A hamlet in Lingen parish, north Herefordshire , England ( OS grid ref SO3669 ) .
A small village and civil parish in mid Northumberland , England ( OS grid ref NY8778 ) .
A hamlet near Ticklerton , Eaton-under-Heywood parish, Shropshire , England ( OS grid ref SO4790 ) .
A town in the Metropolitan Borough of Gateshead , Tyne and Wear , England ( OS grid ref NZ2756 ) .
